original_text: They took soundings and found that the water was a hundred and twenty feet deep. A short time later they took soundings again and found it was ninety feet deep.
korean_text: 물을 재어 보니 스무 길이 되고 조금 가다가 다시 재니 열다섯 길이라

sentences.original_text: and found that the water was a hundred and twenty feet deep
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 백이십 피트 깊이라는 것을 발견했다

sentences.original_text: A short time later they took soundings again
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마 후 그들은 다시 수심을 측정했고

sentences.original_text: and found it was ninety feet deep
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 구십 피트 깊이라는 것을 발견했다
